report.title: Mild and Promising
report.author: Bricoleur
report.bodytext: SET: I am coming into he last 2 months of my audio engineering course. As a result I am required to shift more stress and anxiety; other than this I am in good running order. /n /n SETTING: Early evening at my flat. Last food approximately 4.5 hours prior (fruit salad). Last drug cannabis previous evening. Other than this nothing inside of a week. /n /n 10mg of 4-AcO-DET freebase was loaded into a glass DMT pipe. Freebase was a dark grey powder. /n /n +:00 I take 5 large lung-fulls of before I am satisfied that no chemical remains. Smoke is actually easy to smoke and not harsh on throat or lungs (I am surprised). /n /n After the 3rd toke the first effects are felt. Very similar to the first .5 seconds of 5-MeO-DMT. /n /n Sweaty hands /n /n Colours are more vibrant. /n /n +:10 No mental gymnastics at this point but I can see the veins through my hands. Body is feeling fine no complaints. Lungs feel expanded. /n /n +:15 No progression of visual or mental effects. Upon standing I have a sense of feeling taller. /n /n I do not feel restless. /n /n OEVs are expanded, no morphing or dripping. Colours are vibrant. /n /n CEVs are no more lucid or intricate than when I am sober. /n /n +:30 Notice clenched jaw + tightness in stomach. /n Still no mental gymnastics, although I am starting to peak. /n /n +:45 Increase in sexual awareness I now know what Ill be doing next time with this chemical. /n /n +1:00 Definitely passed my peak. Decide to go for a walk. Phone rings, talking no problem. /n /n +1:10 Go for a walk. /n /n +1:25 Back from the walk. Too cold and navigating London traffic (even as a pedestrian) is too scary. /n Effects have diminished considerably. /n /n +1:45 Just got off the phone talking to a mate about the trip. Post trip synopsis nearly baseline now. /n /n REFLECTION: /n This is a strange experience. I was expecting an increase in associations, to generate new perspectives. I think this is a dosage reliant effect. /n /n Visuals were not the typical bending/morphing variety. No form constants like lattice, filigree, tunnel, spiral, etc. /n /n My visual field seemed expanded or as if I were viewing the world through a fish eye lens. This is a commonly noted effect of 4-AcO-DET.
